content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, x times the sine of 2 x, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative one half times x, times the cosine of 2 x, plus one fourth, times the sine of 2 x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="negative one half times x, times the cosine of 2 x, minus one fourth , times the sine of 2 x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="negative x times the cosine of 2 x, plus, the sine of 2 x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="negative 2 x times the cosine of 2 x, plus, 4 times the sine of 2 x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative one half times x, times the cosine of 2 x, plus one fourth, times the sine of 2 x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>
